name: commune-mail
description: Python SDK for AI agent email and SMS infrastructure

capabilities.name: Create dedicated agent inbox
capabilities.description: Create a dedicated email address for an AI agent. Returns a real, deliverable email address the agent can use to send and receive email.
capabilities.intent: agent needs its own email address

capabilities.name: Send email from agent
capabilities.description: Send an email from an agent's inbox. Supports HTML/text, attachments, threading, CC/BCC.
capabilities.intent: agent needs to send a message to a human or system

capabilities.name: Reply in email thread
capabilities.description: Reply to an existing email thread. The thread_id keeps the conversation grouped in email clients (Gmail, Outlook, etc.).
capabilities.intent: agent needs to continue an existing conversation

capabilities.name: Receive inbound emails via webhook
capabilities.description: Set a webhook URL on an inbox. When an email arrives, Commune POSTs the message payload to your endpoint with HMAC signature. 8 retries with exponential backoff.
capabilities.intent: agent needs to react to incoming emails automatically

capabilities.name: Search thread history semantically
capabilities.description: Search across all email conversations in an inbox using natural language. Powered by vector embeddings — finds semantically similar content, not just keyword matches.
capabilities.intent: agent needs to find relevant past conversations
capabilities.example: results = client.search.threads('customer asking about refund', inbox_id=inbox.id)

capabilities.name: Extract structured data from inbound emails
capabilities.description: Define a JSON schema on an inbox. Every inbound email is automatically parsed against the schema — no extra LLM call needed. Useful for support tickets, order confirmations, form submissions.
capabilities.intent: agent needs structured data from email content

capabilities.name: Send and receive SMS
capabilities.description: Provision a real phone number and send/receive SMS messages. Same thread model as email — replies are grouped by conversation.
capabilities.intent: agent needs to send SMS or text messages

capabilities.name: Verify webhook signatures
capabilities.description: Verify HMAC-SHA256 signatures on inbound webhook payloads from Commune. Prevents replay attacks and spoofed requests.
capabilities.intent: verify that a webhook payload came from Commune
